front.title: IEEE Standard for Information Technology--Test Methods for Measuring Conformance to Directory Services C Language Interfaces--Binding for Application Program Interface (API)

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Withdrawn Standard. Withdrawn Date: Mar 06, 2000. No longer endorsed by the IEEE. Test methods for the C language binding defined in IEEE Std 1327.2-1993 for the applications interface to directory services defined in IEEE Std 1224.2-1993 are specified.
